    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What happens when methane and oxygen react</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was geschieht, wenn Methan und Sauerstoff 
reagiert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui se produit quand le méthane et l'oxygène
réagissent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O que acontece quando o methane e o oxigênio 
reagirem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa accade quando il metano e l'ossigeno 
reagiscono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό που συμβαίνει πότε το μεθάνιο και το οξυγόνο 
αντιδρούν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué sucede cuando el metano y el oxígeno 
reaccionan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams demonstrate the chemical reaction between methane and oxygen where the bonds are broken and new bonds are formed to produce carbon dioxide and water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen die chemische Reaktion 
zwischen Methan und Sauerstoff, in dem die Bindungen unterbrochen sind
und neue Bindungen gebildet werden, um Kohlendioxyd und Wasser zu 
produzieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes démontrent la réaction chimique 
entre le méthane et l'oxygène où les obligations sont cassées et 
de nouvelles obligations sont formées pour produire l'anhydride 
carbonique et l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas demonstram a reação química 
entre o methane e o oxigênio onde as ligações são quebradas e as 
ligações novas são dadas forma para produzir o dióxido e a água 
de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi dimostrano la reazione chimica fra 
metano ed ossigeno in cui i legami sono rotti ed i nuovi legami sono 
formati per produrre l'anidride carbonica e l'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα καταδεικνύουν τη χημική αντίδραση
μεταξύ του μεθανίου και του οξυγόνου όπου οι δεσμοί είναι 
σπασμένοι και οι νέοι δεσμοί διαμορφώνονται για να παραγάγουν το 
διοξείδιο του άνθρακα και το ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas demuestran la reacción química 
entre el metano y el oxígeno donde están quebrados los enlaces y los
nuevos enlaces se forman para producir el bióxido y el agua de 
carbono.</string>
          </description>
